name: Slack Twitter App
description: Send tweets to Twitter from a Slack channel

TWITTER_KEY.description: Set your Twitter Comsumer Key (API Key) to set up Twitter OAuth.

TWITTER_SECRET_KEY.description: Set your Twitter API Secret Key (API Secret) to set up Twitter OAuth.

SLACK_TEAM_DOMAIN.description: Set the Slack team domain name, where tweet channel is located.

SLACK_TOKEN.description: Set your Slack token, created when you created the Outgoing Webhook.
